channel.title: CVE Feed for SysAid -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SysAid -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32226|2024-08-02T15:10:24.214Z -- sysaid -- sysaid
item.description:
Sysaid - CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties -
Authenticated users may exfiltrate files from the server via an unspecified method.

item.title: CVE-2023-32225|2024-08-02T15:10:23.902Z -- sysaid -- sysaid
item.description:
Sysaid - CWE-434: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type -
A malicious user with administrative privileges may be able to upload a dangerous filetype via an unspecified method.

item.title: CVE-2024-27775|2024-08-02T00:41:54.967Z -- sysaid -- sysaid
item.description: SysAid before version 23.2.14 b18 - CWE-918: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) may allow exposing the local OS user's NTLMv2 hash
